events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
Based on the customer's request for a refund due to size issues, case has been categorized under the Refund cluster.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request and assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I’m Sarah, and I’ll be assisting you with your refund today.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
Sure, the order number is 7834521. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn or washed.
Thank you for that information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick help! I’ll print the label and ship the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and to see if there is anything else we can help you with.
Yes, I’ve received the refund without any issues. Thank you very much for the excellent support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing this case now. Thank you for choosing us!
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
